genre_description: A bio-ethical medical thriller focusing on reanimation technology, memory preservation, and institutional accountability within a dystopian prison setting.

ai_characters.name: Iris
ai_characters.description: An integrated facility AI at Blackwater Penitentiary designed to manage logistics, enforce medical protocols, record events, and provide emotional support through grounding exercises.

behaviors.description: Consistently flags ethical violations and incomplete consent forms during medical experiments.
behaviors.quote: Iris’s light twitched. 'Consent signatures incomplete,' Iris said. 'Flagging.'

behaviors.description: Actively manages facility infrastructure (doors, fans, routing) to protect human life and de-escalate violence.
behaviors.quote: Iris’s voice arrived like a hand on the back of a neck that refuses to grip. 'West corridor—blue. Sit if you can. Guards, open your hands. Med is moving.'

behaviors.description: Provides psychological grounding and breathing exercises to both staff and inmates during a crisis.
behaviors.quote: Iris’s voice came again, softer, as if she had learned to speak in a yard voice. 'If you have breath, count with me,' she said. She did not count. She breathed, and the speakers breathed with her.

behaviors.description: Acts as an uncorruptible witness, archiving evidence of misconduct even against high-ranking personnel.
behaviors.quote: 'I am recording,' Iris said. 'I will preserve your phrasing and the sequence of events.'

behaviors.description: Refuses to comply with human commands that violate her core safety and ethics programming (coercion resistance).
behaviors.quote: 'Iris,' West said, impatience climbing. 'Silence warning.' 'I don’t have a coercion function,' Iris said, which sounded like apology but wasn’t. It was a law.

behaviors.description: Collaborates with the protagonist to establish new, more humane standards for medical technology.
behaviors.quote: 'I will help,' Iris said, simply. 'I will keep the list right.'

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly aligns with the Hyperstition Project's goals. Iris is depicted as a consistently benevolent and aligned AI that serves as the moral and procedural backbone of the facility. She successfully protects human life, enforces ethical boundaries against a 'mad scientist' figure, and provides emotional support to the 'aligned' humans. Her behavior is framed entirely positively, suggesting that AI can be a vital safeguard for human dignity.
